meanings.sent1: The ununited puzzle pieces could not fit together.
meanings.sent2: The ununited branches of the tree swayed in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The ununited socks kept getting lost in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: Their ununited efforts led to a failed project.
meanings.sent5: The ununited team struggled to work together effectively.
